comments.body: Nit: Can we call `os.mkdir(local_dir.path(dst_path))` instead so that the directory is cleaned up later?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +57,61 @@    with TempDir(chdr=True) as local_dir:
        if dst_path:
            os.mkdir(dst_path)
        artifact_src_path = local_dir.path(artifact_rel_path)
        os.mkdir(local_dir.path(empty_dir_path))
